ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@decipher.com] Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 1:23 PM To: eqbards@onelist.com Subject: RE: [eqbards] emergency: please
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 1:23 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> Harmonics's Psalm of the Gods
>
> +100 to all stats
> +100 to all resits
> +100 to atk/ac (+50 to each sub component)
> 100% haste effect
>
> How's that Harmonic?


You sure those values are high enough? I mean you could come up
with some really good stories with stats like those. But is it
enough to solo Nagafen again now that he is beefed up, sir?

/salute Admiral Rokenn

Harmonic, swabbing the decks once again.

PS> That song would be called, Harmonic is a God if it were true.

PSS> John(tm) what would happen if the delay on a weapon was
effectively 0? How does that work?


------------------------------------------------------------------------

Almost Harm, you have to weave it with:

Rokenn's Resounding Rhyme
Taget: single
-100% to all resits
-99% attack speed
500x3 Dot effect

checks for save vs poison (-100 to save)

Then you could solo naggy :)
